set.xpath: /items/item[(contains(@name, 'meat') or contains(@name, 'Meat') or contains(@name, 'Stew') or contains(@name, 'Egg') or contains(@name, 'egg') or contains(@name, 'Pie') or contains(@name, 'Fillet'))]/property[@name='Stacknumber' and (@value='50' or @value='500')]/@value
